title: Note
description: A note about this resource. Notes may also include `type` and `language` attributes.

note.title: Note Text
note.description: The text of the note itself.

lang.title: Note Language
lang.description: A language code or language name of the language that this note is written in.

source.title: Source (Person)
source.description: The person who is the source of this note. This is not necessarily the person who wrote it. For example, a linguist could make a note based on something that a speaker reports, in which case the speaker should be listed as the source.
